title: Making History: The Calm and the Storm Gold Edition
notes: Game runs fine but all entries in menu are missing. Unable to play the game.

Need to install extra fonts to the wine prefix for this game: ~/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/371190/pfx/drive_c/windows/Fonts
Fonts can be grabbed from here: https://github.com/TorqDL/moddingmhg/raw/master/OLD/files/winefonts.zip
Without fonts installed, menus and other screens are missing text.
title: Making History: The Calm and the Storm Gold Edition
